explanation: The original else branch always printed "A", so when the total wins were tied it never checked who reached that number first. I replaced that single print line with an expression that: if Takahashi has fewer wins prints "A"; otherwise (tie) finds the index of the cnt-th 'T' and the cnt-th 'A' and prints whichever player reached the cnt-th win earlier. This fixes the tie-handling without changing any other lines.
